name: Kapuru Pasaka Bandaralage Mala Lakmali Pallawala
Uduwe Vidanalage Raveendra Pradeep Kumara Perera
Rajapaksha Kariyapperuma Appuhamilage Dona Gayathri Sulakkana Nadeeshani Rajapaksha
Namarathna Bamunu Arachchilage Devika Kumudinee Namarathna
Algama Appuhamilage Dona Mali Madhuwanthi Algama
Mirihana Arachchige Chathura Themal Jayaruksha Perera
